DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate efficacy two different design characteristic lumbar support low back pain prevention hospital nurse .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Inelastic Elastic Lumbosacral Orthoses Low Back Pain Prevention Hospital Nurses
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain occur frequently one costly health problem affect industry society . Prevention low back pain important individual patient economic perspective . Therefore , many measure available claim reduce low back pain recurrence . The commonly used preventive strategy fitness exercise , lumbar support , education back mechanic lift technique , ergonomic adjustment . However , efficacy still uncertain . The main objective study investigate efficacy two different design characteristic lumbar support low back pain prevention hospital nurse . Investigators hope two type lumbar support reduce incidence low back pain sick leave day . In addition , Investigators hypothesize difference outcome measure two type lumbar support . Enrolled subject randomly assign one follow three group . The first group wear inelastic lumbar support 6 month . The second group wear elastic lumbar support 6 month . The third group receive intervention . After completion 6-month intervention , 6 month fellow-up add .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 20 25 year age 2 . Subjects work nurse less two year continue work nurse le one year 3 . Job content include move lifting patient , longtime stand frequent bend 4 . Subjects participate study concern pain prevention currently next year 1 . Subjects experience low back pain symptom time inquiry , regardless acute chronic , seek medical care currently 2 . Subjects experience 2 episode ( 2 consecutive day ) low back pain symptom 12 month inquiry 3 . Subjects suffer chronic pain disorder symptomatically 4 . Subjects use lumbar support last 6 month 5 . Subjects specific low back pain ( like infection , tumor , osteoporosis , fracture , structural deformity , inflammatory disorder , radicular syndrome cauda equina syndrome , spinal stenosis spondylolysis ) 6 . Subjects spinal operation 7 . Subjects suffer chronic cardiac , respiratory , liver kidney complaint symptomatically 8 . Subjects suffer disease might aggravate increased intraabdominal pressure , like hernia 9 . Subjects suffer chronic gastrointestinal disorder symptomatically 10 . Subjects pregnant , plan baby 1 year le 6 month delivery 11 . Subjects suffer serious somatic disease and/or psychic disease
